questions.question: 1)What is the primary working principle of a resonant sensor for liquid density measurement?

answers.b: Vibration of an element at its resonant frequency

questions.difficulty: Vibration of an element at its resonant frequency

questions.question: 2)The resonant frequency of a resonant sensor changes in response to:

answers.b: The density of the surrounding liquid

questions.difficulty: The density of the surrounding liquid
